displayName.japanese: よし うまくいったわ!

description.english: Won a ranked match online.
description.french: Remporter un combat en Matchmaking selon classement.
description.italian: Vinta una Partita classificata online.
description.spanish: Has ganado una partida igualada en línea.

description.arabic: الفوز بمباراة ترتيبية عبر الإنترنت.
description.brazilian: Venceu uma Partida por Ranking online.

displayName.tchinese: 真是場好比賽，下次再會吧

description.english: Won a player match online.
description.french: Remporter un combat en Matchmaking d'amis.
description.italian: Vinta una Partita del giocatore online.
description.spanish: Has ganado una partida de jugador en línea.
description.tchinese: 在ONLINE的PLAYER MATCH獲勝
description.russian: Вы одержали победу в своей игре по сети.
description.japanese: ONLINEのPLAYER MATCHで勝利した
description.arabic: الفوز بمباراة لاعبين عبر الإنترنت.
description.brazilian: Venceu uma partida com jogador online.

description.english: Won a battle in online tournament.
description.german: Einen Kampf in einem Online-Turnier gewonnen.
description.french: Remporter un combat dans un tournoi en ligne.
description.italian: Vinta una battaglia in un torneo online.
description.spanish: Has ganado un combate en un torneo en línea.
description.tchinese: 在ONLINE的TOURNAMENT獲勝
description.russian: Вы одержали победу в бою сетевого турнира.
description.japanese: ONLINEのTOURNAMENTで勝利した
description.arabic: الفوز بمباراة فى بطولة عبر الإنترنت.
description.brazilian: Venceu uma batalha em torneio online.

displayName.english: Come And Get Some, I Dare You!
displayName.german: Komm und hol's dir, wenn du dich traust!
displayName.french: Viens te battre, si tu l'oses !
displayName.italian: Fatti sotto se hai il coraggio!
displayName.russian: Что ни делай, всё равно огребёшь!
displayName.japanese: どこからでもかかってきな!

description.english: Fought ten online battles.
description.french: Participer à dix combats en ligne.
description.italian: Disputate dieci battaglie online.
description.spanish: Has luchado en diez combates en línea.
description.tchinese: 在ONLINE對戰10次
description.russian: Вы провели десять боёв по сети.
description.japanese: ONLINEで10回対戦した
description.arabic: قاتل في عشر معارك عبر الإنترنت.
description.brazilian: Lutou em dez torneios online.

description.english: Won three times consecutively in Treasure Battle.
description.french: Remporter trois Combats au trésor d'affilée.
description.italian: Tre vittorie consecutive in Battaglia tesoro.
description.spanish: Has ganado tres Combates de tesoro seguidos.
description.tchinese: 在TREASURE BATTLE獲得3連勝
description.russian: Вы одержали три победы подряд в боях за сокровища.
description.japanese: TREASURE BATTLEで3連勝した
description.arabic: الفوز في ثلات مرات متتالية في معركة الكنز.
description.brazilian: Venceu a Batalha por Tesouro três vezes seguidas.

displayName.french: Oh, là, là ! Qu'est-ce que je suis forte !
displayName.japanese: なして私 こんなに強いの

description.english: Won three special matches in Treasure Battle.
description.french: Remporter trois Matchs spéciaux en Combat au trésor.
description.italian: Vinti tre match speciali in Battaglia tesoro.

description.english: Obtained 20 treasure boxes.

displayName.english: You Think You're Tougher Than Me?

displayName.russian: Думаешь, ты можешь со мной тягаться?
displayName.japanese: ワシを倒せるとでも思っておるのか?
displayName.brazilian: Acha que é mais forte do que eu?

description.english: Beat Akuma in an Arcade Battle or a Special Match in Treasure Battle.

displayName.english: There's Nowhere To Run. Give Up!

displayName.french: Abandonne, il n'y a pas d'issue pour toi !
displayName.japanese: 逃げ場は無い 諦めろ
displayName.brazilian: Não tem para onde fugir. Desista!

description.english: Dealt 10 homing attacks. (Excluding offline VS Battle)
description.french: Infliger 10 attaques verrouillées. (Hors Versus hors-ligne)
description.italian: Sferrati 10 attacchi a ricerca (esclusa la Battaglia VS offline).
description.spanish: Has realizado 10 ataques guiados. (Duelo sin conexión no incluido)
description.tchinese: 用追蹤攻擊擊中10次以上(離線模式的對人戰除外)
description.russian: Вы провели десять самонаводящихся атак. (Кроме локальных поединков.)

displayName.english: I'll Kick Your Butt To Hell And Back
displayName.german: Ich schick dich in die Hölle und zurück.
displayName.french: Allez, viens te faire botter le train !
displayName.italian: Non vedo l'ora di prenderti a calci
displayName.spanish: Te daré tal paliza que llegarás al infierno
displayName.tchinese: 來吧，讓我把你踢到地獄的盡頭
displayName.russian: Мой пинок отправит тебя прямо в ад
displayName.japanese: 地獄の果てまで蹴飛ばしてやんよ
displayName.brazilian: Vou chutar seu rabo até o inferno

description.english: Dealt 70+ damage in an air combo. (Excluding offline VS Battle)
description.german: Mehr als 70 Schaden in einer Luftcombo verursacht. (Ausgenommen Offline-Versus-Kampf)
description.french: Infliger plus de 70 points de dégâts dans un combo aérien. (Hors Versus hors-ligne)
description.italian: Inflitti più di 70 danni in una combo aerea (esclusa la Battaglia VS offline).
description.koreana: 공중 콤보로 70 대미지 이상 입혔다 (오프라인의 대인전을 제외)
description.spanish: Has infligido más de 70 de daño en un combo aéreo. (Duelo sin conexión no incluido)

description.brazilian: Causou 70 de dano ou mais em um combo aéreo (exceto Batalhas VS offline).

displayName.english: Just Relax, You Can Do It

displayName.japanese: ハートブレイクショット!

description.english: Snatched victory from the jaws of defeat 5 times with Rage Art. (Excluding offline VS Battle)
description.german: 5 Spiele mit einer Rage Art gewendet und gewonnen. (Ausgenommen Offline-Versus-Kampf)

description.spanish: Has logrado la victoria 5 veces en el último momento con Rage Art. (Duelo sin conexión no incluido)

description.russian: Вы пять раз победили, находясь на грани поражения, при помощи Rage Art. (Кроме лок. поед.)
description.japanese: レイジアーツで5回逆転K.O.した(オフラインの対人戦を除く)

description.english: Dealt an overall total of 1,000 damage while in rage mode. (Excluding offline VS Battle)
